channel.title: Politics

item.title: Clown Show: Democrat Rep. Cherfilus-McCormick Responds to Bombshell Indictment in Astonishing Fashion
Eric Swalwell announces run for California governor, vows to be 'protector and fighter'
item.description: Rep. Eric Swalwell, D-Calif., announced on Thursday he is launching a campaign for California governor in 2026.
